title: Add a “special message” button to the Rose Day page

requirements.text: Add a clearly visible button on the Rose Day card that reveals (and can hide again) a special message when clicked/tapped.

quotes: Add the button that you asked me to show a special message.

acceptanceCriteria: A button is visible within the main card content (near the message/signature) with user-facing text in English (e.g., "Show a special message").
Clicking/tapping the button reveals an additional block of text (the special message) within the card.
Clicking/tapping the button again hides the special message (toggle behavior).
Interacting with the button does not unintentionally trigger the page-level click behavior for the emoji burst (i.e., button click does not bubble to the root click handler).
The button and revealed message match the existing page styling (typography/colors/spacing) and remain readable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Deploy the updated Rose Day site so it is accessible via a shareable public URL.

quotes: I want you to add button and I want you to make this site live so that I can share the URL with my boyfriend.

acceptanceCriteria: A public URL is available for the deployed site and loads the updated page with the new special-message button.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths (compose existing hooks/components instead).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; only add backend changes if strictly necessary for the button behavior (not expected).
nonGoals: Add a signup/login system for the Rose Day site.
Implement credit management or any Caffeine account/credits UI inside the app.
Add backend persistence for the special message state.
